item.title: Trump's 14th week will be dominated by crucial trade talks
item.description: President Donald Trump's 14th week in office set to kick off with famed White House Easter Egg Roll before ongoing tariff negotiations.

item.title: Vance was one of Pope Francis' last visitors
item.description: Vice President JD Vance, who met with the leader of the Catholic Church at the Vatican on Easter Sunday, was one of Pope Francis's last visitors.
